channel.title: Slam on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Slam on Stats On the T

item.title: Is an Early Walkover an Advantage in a Slam?
item.description: After a walkover from Kohlschreiber in the R64, Stefanos Tsitsipas advanced to the third round with one fewer match played this week than any of his competitors. As Tsitsipas takes the court today for a spot in the 4th round, we look at whether skipping a round of play could have an impact on his result at the first slam of the season.
